greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n)^2 is smallest square containing the string 'n'.
comment: "Containment" implies here that the digits of n are consecutive digits in the square; see A091873 for a relaxed alternative. [_R. J. Mathar_, Dec 09 2008]
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: Table[ i=0; While[ StringPosition[ ToString[ i^2 ], ToString[ n ] ]=={}, i++ ]; i, {n, 0, 80} ]
results.author: _Hans Havermann_
